content.headline: The administrators
content.intro1: Who manages the project on the community platform? Add or remove additional administrators here.
content.intro2: administrators can edit, publish, or delete projects. They are not visible on the project's detail page.
content.intro3: Team members are displayed on the project's detail page. They can view events in draft but cannot edit them.

add.headline: Add an administrator
add.intro: Add an existing profile to your project here.
add.label: Name or email

current.headline: Current administrators
current.intro: Here you can see all the project's administrators at a glance.
